featured.text: Recognizing the flashing code of her own species, a female signals back to the male, and he lands beside her.
This is when the largest female in the group begins to change in appearance.
He is the one who protects and looks after the females.
One particular kind of angelfish, the blackspot angelfish, has a special capability that allows it to change gender from female to male.
Moreover, because there are fewer humans around, pregnant females often use tea-growing areas as safe shelters to give birth.

other.text: After darkness falls in some parts of North America, female fireflies gather on the ground.
Which of the following statements is true about the color of angelfish? (A) Female angelfish are blue in color.
Angelfish live in groups, and each group has one male fish, which is blue in color, and four female fish, which are yellow.
When they are hungry, some female fireflies lure the males of other species to them.

definition.zh_def: 女性的，指生物學上或社會上屬於女性的個體或特徵。
definition.en_def: Relating to or characteristic of women or female animals.
definition.example: The female athlete won the gold medal in the competition.
